VisualforceAccessMetrics.name: VisualforceAccessMetrics
VisualforceAccessMetrics.description: Represents summary statistics for Visualforce pages.

ApexPageId.description: The ID of the Visualforce page.

ProfileId.description: The ID of the use who viewed the Visualforce page.

DailyPageViewCount.description: The number of views received by the specified Visualforce page.

MetricsDate.description: The date the metrics are queried.

LogDate.description: The most recent page access date.
